org.openfaces.component.filter
Class FilterCriterion

java.lang.Object
  org.openfaces.component.filter.FilterCriterion
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompositeFilterCriterion, ExpressionFilterCriterion
public abstract class FilterCriterion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

An abstract base class for all filter criterion classes. A filter criterion is an entity that identifies a rule for passing or rejecting data objects during the filtering procedure. The actual rule is defined in the concrete implementations of this class.
